name: Bug Report
description: Report an issue or malfunction in the system.

name: Feature Request
description: Suggest a new feature to improve the system.

name: General Feedback
description: Provide overall feedback about your experience.

name: Compliment
description: Share positive feedback about the system or team.

name: Complaint
description: Express dissatisfaction or report a negative experience.

name: Usability Issue
description: Highlight difficulties in navigating or using the system.

name: Performance Issue
description: Report problems with system speed or responsiveness.

name: Accessibility Feedback
description: Provide suggestions to improve accessibility for all users.

name: Content Feedback
description: Share feedback on the textual or visual content.

name: Other
description: Provide feedback that doesn't fit into other categories.
